title: Diary Of An Everyday Vampire: Volume 1
description: No glitter, no fuss, just a new-fangled view on life… Did you know vampires are real? Of course you did. Well, you always suspected it. And they're not actually undead, just largely unenthusiastic about the modern world. Here's your opportunity to find out the amusing truth... Read the secret thoughts of one such outrageous the Everyday Vampire. "I love the 'Bridget Jones' vampire! This always makes me laugh! It's brilliant!" (Beta review)
author: Thérésa Hedges
